snippet: In the postseason, Major League Baseball’s effort to speed up the sport’s pace might come to a halt as the weight of the games takes precedence over speed.
abstract: Richard Sandomir TV Sports column notes that Major League Baseball is relaxing its pace-of-game rules during postseason.
lead_paragraph: In the postseason, Major League Baseball’s effort to speed up the sport’s pace might come to a halt as the weight of the games takes precedence over speed.

headline.print_headline: Expect Dawdling as M.L.B. Relaxes Game-Pace Rules
headline.main: Expect Dawdling as M.L.B. Relaxes Game-Pace Rules
